mapper.update: update ecs_goods_gallery set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_desc = #{imgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb_url = #{thumbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_original = #{imgOriginal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_attr_id = #{goodsAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_attr_image = #{isAttrImage,jdbcType=BIT}, img_sort = #{imgSort,jdbcType=TINYINT} where img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select img_id, goods_id, img_url, img_desc, thumb_url, img_original, goods_attr_id, is_attr_image, img_sort from ecs_goods_gallery where img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
